actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications,Consumer Protection and Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to establish margin requirements of 50 percent for extensions of credit for the purchase of securities.

summary.text: Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to establish margin requirements of 50 percent for the initial extension or maintenance of credit for the purchase of securities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to establish margin requirements of 50 percent for extensions of credit for the purchase of securities.
